ResistanceFeature.Name: Tourmaline Ring of Resistance (Cold)
ResistanceFeature.Text: You have resistance to cold damage while wearing this ring.

MagicProperty.Name: Tourmaline Ring of Resistance (Cold)
MagicProperty.Description: You have resistance to one damage type while wearing this ring. The gem in the ring indicates the type, which the DM chooses or determines randomly. d10 - Damage Type - Gem 1 - Acid - Pearl 2 - Cold - Tourmaline 3 - Fire - Garnet 4 - Force - Sapphire 5 - Lightning - Citrine 6 - Necrotic - Jet 7 - Poison - Amethyst 8 - Psychic - Jade 9 - Radiant - Topaz 10 - Thunder - Spinel
